dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and evaluate evidence to arrive at a solution.
Your FarTwin will generate innovative solutions by thinking outside the box.

dimensions.label: Attitude Towards Humor
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin use humor in social interactions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use humor to lighten the mood and build connections.
Your FarTwin will use humor to deflect or mock others in social interactions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge and skills?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on abstract concepts and theoretical frameworks.
Your FarTwin will prioritize hands-on experience and application.

dimensions.label: Competitive Drive
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach competitions or challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will compete fiercely and aggressively to win.
Your FarTwin will work with others to achieve a shared goal or victory.

dimensions.label: Relationship Building Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin form connections with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be proactive in initiating and maintaining relationships.
Your FarTwin will prefer to observe and listen before contributing to a conversation or relationship.

dimensions.label: Professionalism Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach work or professional life?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach work with a focus on efficiency and results.
Your FarTwin will prioritize creativity and innovation in professional endeavors.

dimensions.label: Data Analysis Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze and interpret data?

options.description: Your FarTwin will scrutinize data for accuracy and detail.
Your FarTwin will prioritize patterns and trends in data to inform decisions.

dimensions.label: Self-Presentation Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin present themselves online?

options.description: Your FarTwin will showcase their personality and accomplishments with confidence.
Your FarTwin will downplay achievements and focus on others' success.
